price: Na Luut'i alipo waambia watu wake: Je! Mnafanya uchafu nanyi mnaona?
arabic: وَلُوطًا إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِهِۦٓ أَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلۡفَٰحِشَةَ وَأَنتُمۡ تُبۡصِرُونَ
footnotes: Ewe Nabii! Mtaje Luut'i na khabari zake pamoja na kaumu ya watendao uchafu, pale alipo waambia: Je! Mnafanya dhambi hizi ambazo zimepita hadi ya uchafu na kinyume na maumbile, na hali nyinyi mnaona na mnaangalia uovu wa haya mliyo yashikilia?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walūṭan idh qāla liqawmihi atatūna al-fāḥishata wa-antum tub'ṣirūna
